reviews.review: Brabo demais, mto bom pra se divertir com os crias e mto interativo.

作为一个700h的玩家，还是怀念一开始萌新的感觉。就是那种，四个人醒来在一个未知的地方，不仅要小心翼翼的修机，还要躲避不知道从哪冒出来的屠夫。最后拼劲全力逃出生天的感觉。每个屠夫也有自己不同的能力，相对于的玩（对）法（抗）也会有所不同。每个屠夫都可以巧用自己的能力来完成一个个杀人“艺术”。还在摸索阶段的时候对不同屠夫的能力和技能的惊奇，巧妙的感觉，随着时间的推移已经荡然无存了。

现在？死？死亡不是解脱！你可以砍我无数次，但我只要皮到你一次，我就是赚到！有种你来砍————我重伤倒地了！
真是又菜又爱瞎搞（）

This game has THE MOST TOXIC COMMUNITY OUT OF ANY GAME OUT THERE. I've played CS:GO, League, Overwatch, CoD, etc. And DBD takes the cake easily. God forbid you're a killer main that knows how to play. That being said tho........... Its a really fun / mindless game, been playing this game for years across multiple platforms and I recommend it. Although word of advice: stay around the green/purple ranks. Once you hit Red, you might as well start a chemical plant with how many toxic players you'll run into. The game is very much leaning towards survivors, so killer mains have to be innovative if they want to win, especially if they're Surviving with Friends. On the survivor side, there's a lot of killers who leave within 1 minute if your team gets couple of easy gens off of them. TLDR; The game is great, the community is the only con.

This is easily the most unbalanced game I've ever played, yet it's still really fun. Tunneling, Face-camping and other scummy tactics are annoying but you'll become numb to it after the 80 hour mark of playing Survivor. The only real complaint about this game is the hit boxes being horrible. It makes it to easy for the killer to hit you.
The game is good, expect some bugs and some toxicity but other than that this game is an absolute masterpiece.

É um jogo bem divertido, especialmente jogando com amigos. O bom é que no começo não se perde nada. Apenas nos níveis ranks mais avançados que precisa levar o jogo mais a sério. Morrer não necessariamente é perda.

stay away. addicting and fun at times but also makes me want to end my life. would not recommend

Very fun game if you have friends to play with, The community is kind of toxic but you find a few people that will stick with you for a while, and make the game more fun for you.
The Pro's of this game are: It's fun and you cannot expect anything to happen, everyone plays different, you learn different ways to play.
The Con's of this game are: The toxic community some people are really rude even if you do very well in the game,It's either really killer sided or survivor sided,a lot of people play it to get a reaction out of people and queue times are long.
Excelente jogo para quem gosta de sabotar as engrenagem

Muito bom para jogar com os amigos! A jogabilidade é boa e o game também tem bastante mapas temáticos e sombrios. No começo era bem tenso quando se estava sendo perseguido pelo killer, hahahaha!

the game used to be good. now i only get matched with Survive with Friends groups that have a much higher skill level than me every time i play killer. only worth playing private games now. apart from private games, just a waste of space on my PC.
EDIT: now want to play it even less because i am apparently a bad player for not BUYING DLC CONTENT. Pay to Win games are scum and a stain and should be deleted. If i could refund this game, i would.

Pros:
1. The Game itself is quite Fun
2. It's a lot of fun in custom Games with 4 Friends (5 Players)
3. There are almost no Competitors / Alternatives that are like DBD (apart from the no longer accessible Evolve Stage 2)
Cons:
1. I've never seen a Game with worse hit Boxes
2. The ranking system is pretty bad and doesn't really make sense
3. Not balanced at all
4. The DLCs are critical, some are pretty unbalanced and if you only get some Survivors and Killers by DLCs it sucks
5. The Community is often quite toxic, if the Game had a live (in match) chat or voicechat at all it would be close to csgo's toxicity level
6. 75% of the games the killer camps 1 or 2 players and the others can easily escape, but one or two players are not allowed to have fun
7. I've never seen worse Servers
8. Gens fall way to Fast
9. Some Killers can camp way to easy
its good but bring the old HUD back or so help me. also make console players see chat im sick of saying gg to basically no one

Dead by Daylight wygląda zupełnie inaczej z perspektywy mordercy. Rozgrywka zamienia się z trzecioosobowej walki o przetrwanie w pierwszoosobowe polowanie. Oprawca zawsze jest nieco szybszy od swoich ofiar, dzięki czemu wcześniej czy później dopada biednych nastolatków. Oczywiście o ile najpierw odnajdzie ich na mapie.

Игра полная триждыблядская ярость, которая уничтожит ваши нервы, заберёт ваши деньги, лишит вас семьи и друзей, у вас начнутся беды с бошкой. Спустя время вы поймёте, что зря проеBали годы жизни на это Gовнище, но все равно продолжите играть в нее, ведь она создана для отсталых деградирующих aутистов, которые буду бомбить от многочисленных багов этой Zалупы, над которыми никто не работает. Бубба соси

Gra pod kątem balansu i problemów technicznych ma swoje wzloty i upadki, ale sam koncept w niej zawarty oraz interaktywność z innymi graczami to rekompensuje. Jeżeli lubisz lekko mroczne klimaty połączone z funkcją multiplayer oraz uwielbiasz rywalizować, ta gra jest z pewnością warta przetestowania!
